articles.description: At the NSE, LIC share price ended at Rs 792.20 per share, climbing 3.62 per cent. During the day, it jumped 7.39 per cent to Rs 821 -- its 52-week high level. The company's market valuation also climbed Rs 18,057.88 crore to reach Rs 5,01,635.57 crore.

articles.title: JSPL, RINL to jointly secure supply of liquid steel to upcoming Angul plant - Business Standard
articles.description: Jindal Steel Power Ltd on Saturday said its partnership with Rashtriya Ispat Nigam Ltd will ensure the supply of liquid steel to its upcoming hot strip mill at Angul in Odisha.
articles.content:

articles.title: India expected to see 1 crore EV sales annually by 2030, create 5 crore jobs: Nitin Gadkari - Moneycontrol
